files.summary: Contains: wiki overview and navigation links. Includes: sections for background, mission & vision, culture, hierarchy, systems, marketing, people, and offices.
Contains: marketing philosophy and stories. Includes: quiet, credibility‑driven approach, community meetups, visual identity, and internal marketing view.
Contains: company origin and timeline. Includes: founding trio, early co‑working desks, first PoC success, pandemic response, and expansion to Amsterdam and Vienna.
Contains: org hierarchy and reporting lines. Includes: CEO/CTO/COO, lead engineers and consultants, core team members, and two‑step decision chain.
Contains: acquisition details and new security/compliance rules. Includes: stricter permissions, JIRA ticket linking, cost‑centre codes, temporary lockdown mode, and branding mention.
Contains: cultural habits, rituals, and stories. Includes: Demo Fridays, Aether‑Days, Wall of Quotes, decision principles, and focus‑time protection.
Contains: list of office locations. Includes: links to Munich HQ, Amsterdam branch, and Vienna branch pages.
Contains: mission, vision, and values narrative. Includes: purpose to make AI real, honesty over hype, small teams, focus, public learning, and sustainable pace.
Contains: Amsterdam office details. Includes: co‑working location, open atmosphere, key staff, café stand‑ups, snow‑day workshop, and napkin‑diagram story.
Contains: Munich HQ details. Includes: central location, bright office, executive presence, kitchen hub, morning drift, and surprise‑cake tradition.
Contains: profile of Jonas Weiss. Includes: lead consultant role, workshop skills, aspirations, personal style, and anecdotal stories.
Contains: profile of Klara Houtman. Includes: lead software engineer role, web/backend background, UI philosophy, aspirations, and anecdotes.
Contains: core skill definitions matrix. Includes: technical, consulting, collaboration, and personal skill identifiers with full names.
Contains: profile of Mira Schäfer. Includes: software engineer role, API & UI focus, strengths, aspirations, and demo anecdotes.
Contains: profile of Felix Baum. Includes: AI engineer role, computer vision focus, edge‑AI strengths, aspirations, and lighting‑diffuser anecdote.
Contains: profile of Richard Klein. Includes: operations coordinator role, time‑tracking and expense oversight, snack‑stash story, and improvement initiatives.
Contains: profile of Elena Vogel. Includes: CEO role, consulting background, mission drive, leadership style, and homemade‑cake anecdote.
Contains: Vienna branch details. Includes: industrial lab setting, hardware focus, lab hours, key staff, mug‑anomaly anecdote, and night‑shift story.
Contains: overview of internal systems. Includes: CRM, time & expense tracker, system dependency tracker, wiki, and usage notes.
Contains: profile of Ana Kovác. Includes: senior AI engineer role, NLP/LLM focus, strengths, aspirations, and dragon‑prompt anecdote.
Contains: profile of Lukas Brenner. Includes: lead AI engineer role, vision & edge‑AI expertise, mentoring focus, night‑shift story, and mug‑anomaly.
Contains: profile of Marko Petrovic. Includes: CTO role, PhD background, architectural strengths, communication style, and cat‑on‑keyboard legend.
Contains: agent and data‑access policy rules. Includes: role levels, data sensitivity categories, access permissions, public‑site constraints, and safety defaults.
contains: profile of Sofia Rinaldi. includes: coo role, finance/ops expertise, risk focus, “oracle” spreadsheet, and operational style.
Contains: index of all people profiles. Includes: links to executives, team leads, and core team members.

Contains: profile of Timo van Dijk. Includes: software engineer role, backend focus, cloud deployment, observability, performance‑issue anecdote, and engineering style.
